submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minimumOperations(self, nums, target):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type target: List[int]
        :rtype: int
        """
        operation = 0
        ans = 0
        prevdiff = abs(target[0]-nums[0])
        operation = prevdiff
        if target[0]-nums[0]>0:
            direc = 1
        elif target[0]-nums[0]<0:
            direc = -1
        else:
            direc = 0
        nums.append(0)
        target.append(0)
        for i in range(1,len(nums)):
            diff = abs(target[i]-nums[i])
            currDirec = 0
            if target[i]-nums[i]>0:
                currDirec = 1
            elif target[i]-nums[i]<0:
                currDirec = -1
            #if same direction
            if currDirec==direc:
                if diff>prevdiff:
                    ans+=operation
                    operation = diff-prevdiff
                prevdiff = diff
            else:
                ans+=operation
                operation = diff
                prevdiff = diff
                direc = currDirec
        return ans
